comments.content:
Looking for the name of the ATCO Records logo font.  
Thank you!

To me and even if it's not matching perfectly (mainly /T top slab serif arm pits), I probably go for a [Clarendon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/clarendon), customized a bit maybe like artificially emboldened and rounded. But that's probably more [Egiziano](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Egiziano).  
So more Egyptienne alternatives: [Giza](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/giza) (FiveFive is possibly the closest for this family), [Cowboy Rodeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/cowboy-rodeo), [Antique 6](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/woodentypefonts/antique-six), [Egiziano Classic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ortizlopez/olegiziano-classic), [Belizio](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/belizio), [Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hwt/hwt-slab), [Gold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/gold), [Lockup](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/lockup), [Hoosegow](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/hoosegow), [Aldogizio](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tegetype/Aldogizio)

Thank you for the input Ryuk!  
 I'll give it a look.
Man, some of those were really really close. Thank you so much Ryuk!

Good finds Ryuk.  
To my eye the closest match would be somewhere between Aldogizio Heavy

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AldogizioHeavyAsATCO_6060.gif)
 and Aldogizio Black 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AldogizioBlackAsATCO_5834.gif)
  
Among the runner-up candidates I like HWT Slab Columbian  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HWTSlabColumbianAsATCO_5282.gif)
 despite its lighter weight.  
I also like OL Egiziano Classic Black  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073336im_/http:/typophile.com/files/OLEgizianoClassicBlackAsATCOb_6205.gif)
  
 but find that its serif treatment is too harsh and heavy.  
Don
Thanks Tom and Don. Best choice here to me is Egiziano Classic mainly of because /T arm pits and /C dug counter. Adding an outline stroke and rounding it a bit should get the job very close.
